mapper.select: SELECT NVL(security_symbol, '') as synm , NVL(security_name_vn, '') as secNm_vn , NVL(security_name_en, '') as secNm_en , NVL(market, '') as marketId , NVL(lending_ratio, '') as ratio , NVL(security_type, '') as snum FROM USR_SYMBLIST ORDER BY security_symbol ASC

SELECT security_symbol as synm,security_name_vn as aecNm_vn, security_name_en as secNm_en, market as marketId, lending_ratio as ratio, security_type as snum FROM USR_SYMBLIST WHERE security_symbol LIKE '%'||#{searchKey}||'%'
